name: Flips: Faraway Tree Stories
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

AN AMAZING ADVENTURE IN THE ENCHANGED WOOD

Climb the Faraway Tree and meet Moon-Face, Saucepan Man & Silky the Fairy.

INTERACTIVE FEATURES

  • Find collectables as you read to unlock activities and recipies that you can do and make at home!
  • Share chapters with friends via DS Wireless Communications!
  • Enjoy illustrations, animations and sound effects!!

INCLUDES 6 BOOKS TO READ!

  • THE MAGIC FARAWAY TREE
  • THE FOLK OF THE FARAWAY TREE
  • THE ENCHANTED WOOD
  • SILKY AND THE RAINBOW FEATHER
  • MELODY AND THE ENCHANTED HARP
  • PETAL AND THE ETERNAL BLOOM
developedBy: EA Bright Light, Shanghai Mineloader Software Co., Ltd.
